input.sentences: there was a marathon in town today .
it was n't just any marathon though .
people were dressed up in funny costumes when running .
some people were almost naked even though it was freezing cold !
this person dressed up as a rabbit .
output.sentences: The town's annual marathon was always an unusual affair.
Fun and flamboyant costumes were the norm.
People of all generations enjoying dressing up eccentrically for the big day.
Some unique individuals were not quite dressed for the weather.
The day also featured some furry friends, as well.
